projects.title: Web Port folio
overview: This portfolio was engineered with React, structured to deliver a performant and scalable interface showcasing my work and technical capabilities.

The entire layout and user flow were first planned in Figma and refined in Adobe Illustrator, ensuring consistent visual guidelines and a clear component hierarchy. Styling was implemented using SAAS to maintain modularity and maintainable architecture.
The project focuses on efficient component composition, optimized rendering, and integration with external data sources, resulting in a responsive and easily extensible codebase.

projects.title: Movie Data Base
overview: This project was built using React with the goal of creating a movie database connected to the TMDB (The Movie Database) API.

Before development, I designed the entire prototype in Adobe XD, studying and planning the application from its initial concept stage. The interface allows users to explore popular movies, search for titles, and view detailed information fetched from the API. The design was styled with SCSS, ensuring a clean, responsive, and visually consistent layout.
The project focuses on clean architecture, efficient API integration, and delivering a smooth browsing experience.

projects.title: Online Store, NL
overview: This project was developed on Shopify to support a real charity event in Fortaleza, Brazil, providing a fully functional online store for selling physical products.

The visual identity and promotional assets were crafted using Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop, ensuring brand consistency across the storefront and marketing materials. The store structure was configured with custom sections, optimized product pages, and streamlined checkout settings.

The focus of the project was on scalable store configuration, efficient CMS usage, optimized product management, and reliable order handling to support a smooth purchasing experience during the event.

projects.title: Way Finder, Tours
overview: This project was built using WordPress to create a fully customizable tour showcase platform for a travel-focused business.

All page layouts and user flows were planned in Figma and refined in Adobe Illustrator, ensuring a cohesive visual identity and clear information hierarchy throughout the site. Custom templates and WordPress blocks were implemented to support dynamic content management.
The project emphasizes CMS flexibility, optimized page structure, SEO-friendly configuration, and scalable content organization tailored for a tourism-driven experience.
